member.name: ITfSystemDeviceTypeLangBarItem.GetIconMode
member.summary: Obtains the current icon display mode for a system language bar item.
member.param: Pointer to a DWORD that receives the current icon display mode for a system language bar item. For more information about possible values, see the dwFlags parameter in .

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The system language bar item does not support this method.

member.name: ITfSystemDeviceTypeLangBarItem.SetIconMode
member.summary: Modifies the type of icon displayed for a system language bar item.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Specifies how the system language bar item should display the icon. This can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: The system language bar item should display a default icon for the item.
The system language bar item should display the icon specified for the language profile.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The system language bar item does not support this method.

member.name: ITfSystemDeviceTypeLangBarItem
member.summary: The ITfSystemDeviceTypeLangBarItem interface is implemented by a system language bar item and used by an application or text service to control how the system item displays its icon. The application or text service obtains an instance of this interface by calling QueryInterface on the object with IID_ITfSystemDeviceTypeLangBarItem.
